headline: A Look At PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Why PNC Financial Services Group is on investor watch PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) is drawing attention after recent share price moves, with the stock last closing at $211.46 as investors weigh its banking mix and earnings profile. See our latest analysis for PNC Financial Services Group. The recent 1 day share price return of 1.31% and 30 day share price return of 6.87% put PNC near its recent high at $211.46.
